title: The Ostrom Avenue Podcast Episode 224 : MBB Transfer News , Spring Game Approaching + Big Test for Men Lacrosse
body_text: AJ Myers and Griffin Bloomstein unpack Syracuse men's basketball's recent activity in the transfer portal and discuss whether the Orange still needs more additions. They also dive into who may have the advantage at quarterback ahead of the spring game for Syracuse football. Finally, AJ and Griffin preview the upcoming matchups for Syracuse men's and women's lacrosse.
